name: Space Chaos (itch) (Jan_Hunter)
description:
Space Chaos One day chaos reigned in space, All meteors attack through the Earth, you have to save the (Shield)  Do you want to save it??  Enjoy :)  (Game is best played in window view, which the game automatically starts in!) About Game: it's very simple game in space  /////////////////////////////////////////////////// every 100 score increases damage of meteors by 5 HP  /////////////////////////////////////////////////// Game made for Mini Jam 74 /////////////////////////////////////////// Controller: Keyboard: X ---> Rotation Left B---> Rotation Right Space---> Shoot credit : programmer: Jan_Hunter Artist: Andy_Hunter  challenge for you: 250 Score (easy)   500 Score (medium)   1000 Score (Hard)   3000 Score (impossible) Note: We Made this Game in 12 hours only!!

sorry for bad English

Thanks :)
